articles.author: Mariel Padilla
articles.title: Pika-Who? How Pokémon Go Confused the Canadian Military
articles.description: “We should almost hire a 12-year-old to help us out with this,” an official wrote.
articles.content:
And when another man was stopped on a military base, he was also using the app and told officials that he was trying to get more points than his children, according to the military documents obtained by CBC News.

articles.author: Katherine Rosman
articles.title: The Work Diary of Anna Bond, Whose Work Includes … Making Diaries
articles.description: In an iCal era, the co-founder of Rifle Paper Co., seller of stationery and home goods, still relies on physical planners (and the drive-through).
articles.content: Rifle employs more than 150 people between its headquarters in Winter Park, Fla., its nearby warehouse where orders are fulfilled and its office in New York. Its offerings have expanded to include wrapping paper, gift bags, phone cases, book covers, sneakers,… [+1490 chars]
